short_description: SQL/MR function for training a text classifier
long_description: SQL/MR function for training a text classification model. Current implementation supports maximum entropy model and KNN model

argument_clauses.name: Domain
argument_clauses.description: The address of the Queen. The host parameter is the Aster Database Queenâ€™s IP saddress or hostname.

argument_clauses.name: Database
argument_clauses.description: The name of the database where the input table is located.

argument_clauses.name: UserId
argument_clauses.description: The Aster Database user name of the user running this function.

argument_clauses.name: Password
argument_clauses.description: The Aster Database password of the user.

argument_clauses.name: SSLSettings
argument_clauses.description: A string that includes all the SSL settings, except the password for the truststore.

argument_clauses.name: SSLTrustStorePassword
argument_clauses.description: The password for the SSL truststore.

argument_clauses.name: InputTable
argument_clauses.description: The table or view that holds the documents to use for training the model

argument_clauses.name: TextColumn
argument_clauses.description: The input table column whose content will be scanned

argument_clauses.name: CategoryColumn
argument_clauses.description: The input table column that contains the category of the training documents

argument_clauses.name: ClassifierType
argument_clauses.description: One of '{ MaxEnt | KNN }' classifier type The permitted input values are [maxEnt, knn]. The default value is maxEnt.

argument_clauses.name: ClassifierParameters
argument_clauses.description: If the CLASSIFIERTYPE is KNN, the 'compress' parameter can be specified. Range 0..1 . The default is not specified

argument_clauses.name: NlpParameters
argument_clauses.description: Used to pass in the parameters for pre-processing. Format: 'name:value','name:value',...

argument_clauses.name: ModelFile
argument_clauses.description: The name of the model file to be generated

argument_clauses.name: FeatureSelectionMethod
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the feature selection method to use. This version of the function supports DF selector (document Frequency). Format: 'DF:[<min_value>:<max_value>], where min_value, max_value are values in the range 0..1 or 'minValue', 'maxValue'
